value.title: StarCraft 2: REAPER SURPRISES - Professional 2v2! (Maru & ByuN vs Solar & Ryung)
value.excerpt: Best-of-5 series of StarCraft 2 played in 2v2. Normally we don't see many pro games played in 2v2, but these games from the OlimoLeague are a lot of fun. value.title: StarCraft 2: REYNOR's Protoss vs HEROMARINE! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Professional match of StarCraft 2. In this best-of-3 series of Protoss versus Terran, we see a variety of playstyles from both players. While game number one is a quick and dirty match, the rest of the series is very impressive gameplay. Reynor's Protoss is quickly becoming better and better...  Support

value.title: StarCraft 2: Reynor's TERRAN vs MaxPax! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Reynor as Terran and MaxPax as Protoss. Reynor is normally a Zerg in SC2, but he apparently decided to sign up to this ESL Open Cup with Terran instead. This series is the Grand Finals of the OlimoLeague Invitational 9, and all games take place on old maps that were mostly played in Wings of Liberty and Heart of the Swarm. value.title: StarCraft 2: Scarlett's PROTOSS Offrace?! (Scarlett vs PiG)
